Package org.lwjgl.openvr

Class VROverlayIntersectionResults

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.openvr.VROverlayIntersectionResults
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class VROverlayIntersectionResults extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct VROverlayIntersectionResults_t {
     HmdVector3_t vPoint;
     HmdVector3_t vNormal;
     HmdVector2_t vUVs;
     float fDistance;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • VROverlayIntersectionResults

      public VROverlayIntersectionResults(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a VROverlayIntersectionResults instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
